En.DECIDUEYE_PA1_TEXT_1: Deals 20% increased damage to distant enemies. Additional damage added per level from each move's damage formula is excluded from this bonus.
En.DECIDUEYE_BA1_TEXT_1: Increases the speed of basic attacks by 3% for a short time after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, basic attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.
En.DECIDUEYE_BA1_TAG_TEXT_1: Increases the speed of auto attacks by 3% for a short time after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, auto attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_LEAFAGE_TEXT_1: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage in a cone to enemies hit (only hits once). For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack is increased by 10% (this also affects Leafage) and auto attack speed is increased by 25% for 3s.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_1: Summons whirling razor leaves. While active, Decidueye's auto attack is replaced by a new auto attack that targets up to 2 additional enemies in range, as well as increasing Attack by 10% and auto attack speed. This buff lasts for 5.5s.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TAG_TEXT_2: Increases Attack Speed by 1% x (Level -1) + 21% for 5.5s.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_2: Increases auto attack damage by 2% of the primary target's remaining HP and 1% for secondary targets. This damage only applies once per attack, not on each of the 3 boosted quills. Against All Enemies: The additional damage from remaining HP is capped at 240 on the primary target and 120 on secondary targets.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SPIRIT_SHACKLE_TEXT_1: Charges power before firing a large arrow in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged (with 6 breakpoints), but movement speed is decreased by 25% while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected enemy has their movement speed decreased by 80% for a short time when exiting the area, and receives damage upon leaving the area. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 2s cooldown between uses.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SPIRIT_SHACKLE_TEXT_2: Deals 15% increased damage to enemies with less than 50% remaining HP.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_ASTONISH_TEXT_1: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed by 80% for a short time.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_LEAF_STORM_TEXT_1: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed by 45% for 2s. At point-blank range, it also shoves and stuns enemies hit.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK_TEXT_1: Creates a shadow that takes hold of one enemy in the area of effect, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 30%, decreasing their Defense by 60%, and increasing Decidueye’s movement speed by 70% for 3s.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK_TEXT_2: Defense reduction of enemies is increased to 80%.
En.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_NOCK_NOCK_TEXT_1: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies but does not pierce through them. The move ends by unleashing a large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits (30% more damage if the target is below 50% HP). While using this move, Decidueye becomes immune to hindrances but is unable to move.

Cn.DECIDUEYE_PA1_TEXT_1: 对远处敌人的伤害提高 20%。每个移动的伤害公式中每级增加的额外伤害不包括在此奖励中。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_BA1_TEXT_1: 一击后短时间内提升普通攻击速度3%。此效果最多可叠加 4 次，每激活三次此效果，基本攻击会在短时间内变为增强攻击。这些增强的攻击会发射更多的羽毛笔，但每根羽毛笔造成的伤害会降低。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_BA1_TAG_TEXT_1: 一击后短时间内自动攻击速度提高3%。此效果最多可叠加 4 次，并且此效果每激活 3 次，自动攻击会在短时间内变为增强攻击。这些增强的攻击会发射更多的羽毛笔，但每根羽毛笔造成的伤害会降低。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_LEAFAGE_TEXT_1: 皮毛朝指定方向离开，对被击中的敌人造成锥形范围内的伤害（仅击中一次）。使用此招式后的短时间内，Decidueye 的攻击增加 10%（这也影响 Leafage），自动攻击速度增加 25%，持续 3 秒。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_1: 召唤旋转的剃刀叶。激活时，Decidueye 的自动攻击被一个新的自动攻击所取代，该自动攻击最多可以攻击范围内的 2 个额外敌人，并提高 10% 的攻击力和自动攻击速度。该增益持续 5.5 秒。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TAG_TEXT_2: 增加攻击速度 1% x (等级 -1) + 21% 持续 5.5 秒。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_2: 增加主要目标剩余 HP 的 2% 和次要目标 1% 的自动攻击伤害。此伤害每次攻击仅适用一次，而不适用于 3 个增强的刚毛中的每一个。对抗所有敌人：剩余生命值对主要目标的额外伤害上限为 240，对次要目标的上限为 120。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SPIRIT_SHACKLE_TEXT_1: 在向指定方向射出大箭之前充能。蓄力时间越长（有 6 个断点），造成的伤害会增加，但蓄力时移动速度会降低 25%。如果这个招式在能量充到最大后击中，它可以将敌人缝合在地上。受影响的敌人在离开区域时短时间内降低80%的移动速度，并在离开区域时受到伤害。此移动最多可保留 3 次使用。使用之间有 2 秒的冷却时间。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SPIRIT_SHACKLE_TEXT_2: 对剩余生命值低于 50% 的敌人造成 15% 的额外伤害。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_ASTONISH_TEXT_1: 对敌人造成伤害并在短时间内降低他们80%的移动速度。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_LEAF_STORM_TEXT_1: 制造锋利的树叶风暴，对命中的敌人造成伤害并使其移动速度降低 45%，持续 2 秒。在近距离范围内，它还会推开并击晕被击中的敌人。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_LEAF_STORM_TEXT_2: 移动速度降低现在持续 3 秒。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK_TEXT_1: 在效果范围内制造一个影子抓住一名敌人，造成伤害并降低其30%的移动速度，降低其60%的防御力，并使Decidueye的移动速度提高70%，持续3秒。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK_TEXT_2: 敌人的防御减少增加到80%。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_NOCK_NOCK_TEXT_1: 向指定方向发射尖刺，对敌人造成伤害但不会穿透他们。移动结束时释放出一根巨大的羽毛笔，对它击中的所有敌人造成伤害（如果目标生命值低于 50%，则伤害增加 30%）。在使用此招式时，Decidueye 免疫障碍但无法移动。
Cn.DECIDUEYE_MOVE_NOCK_NOCK_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% 最大生命值护盾
